name: BloxGame (beta)
description:
Whatever you can Imagine, you can Build it in BloxGame! BloxGame is a Free Virtual-Blocks Game to Build Anything You Can Imagine... From Cars to Houses, From Big Buildings to Small Buildings! Anything you Can Imagine can be on BloxGame!

Requieres at Least A Computer from this Year (1990)

Requieres at least MacOS 6 or Windows 3.0

BloxGame its Free!

Join our AOL Instant Messenger!
